short_summary: Sheet Metal Shear Unit purchased by the Department of National Defence (DND)
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) requires a metal shearing unit for Fleet Maintenance Facility Cape Breton (FMF CB).
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Metal Plate Shear Unit
----------------------------------------

**Tender Reference:** WS3631896514-Doc4104407823

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)

**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Bid Closing Date:** 2023-09-11T14:00:00

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified suppliers to submit bids for the supply of a Sheet Metal Shear Unit for the Department of National Defence (DND), Fleet Maintenance Facility Cape Breton (FMF CB).

The supplier will be expected to deliver a Sheet Metal Shear Unit that meets the specified requirements and standards.

**Key Requirements:**

* Supply a Sheet Metal Shear Unit to the Department of National Defence (DND), Fleet Maintenance Facility Cape Breton (FMF CB)
* Meet the specified requirements and standards
* Provide a safe and efficient means to cut, shear, and form metal sheets

**Trade Agreements:**

This procurement is subject to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

**Regions of Delivery:**

The contract will be delivered to the Department of National Defence (DND), Fleet Maintenance Facility Cape Breton (FMF CB) in British Columbia.

**Contact Information:**

For any inquiries, please contact:
Shaylan Stein (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: shaylan.stein@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Attachments
 No attachments are required for this tender announcement.
